name: The tragedy of jerome
description:
Escape the mansion with your inheritance as your family attempts to kill you and take it for themselves in this first-person action-adventure game!

The tragedy of Jerome was an exercise in prototyping an action adventure game, created in a month. It features a single level that shows off a simple combat system, crafting system, and elemental effect system used for environmental puzzles. 

Credits:

Massimo Gauthier - Programming and Game Design

Zidi Zhu - Art

Jeremy Dumont - Sound and Additional Art
